about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

name: python-framel
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.21.4
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: python-framel
  version: 8.41.1
source:
  patches: null
  sha256: 555cb3af32b9877b60a435114f461d43be5ed9189ddb7daf6e5531fa514bda47
  url: https://git.ligo.org/virgo/virgoapp/Fr/-/archive/v8r41p1/Fr-v8r41p1.tar.gz
build:
  ignore_run_exports:
    - python
  number: 0
  string: py36hf14bfbd_0
requirements:
  build:
    - bzip2 1.0.8 hc929b4f_4
    - c-ares 1.17.1 hc929b4f_0
    - ca-certificates 2020.12.5 h033912b_0
    - cctools_osx-64 949.0.1 h2f0f38f_19
    - clang 11.0.1 h694c41f_1
    - clang-11 11.0.1 default_hf8bb9ca_1
    - clang_osx-64 11.0.1 hb91bd55_0
    - clangxx 11.0.1 default_hf8bb9ca_1
    - cmake 3.19.4 h4986e64_1
    - compiler-rt 11.0.1 h654b07c_0
    - compiler-rt_osx-64 11.0.1 h8c5fa43_0
    - expat 2.2.10 h1c7c35f_0
    - krb5 1.17.2 h60d9502_0
    - ld64_osx-64 530 hea264c1_19
    - ldid 2.1.2 h7660a38_2
    - libclang-cpp11 11.0.1 default_hf8bb9ca_1
    - libcurl 7.71.1 h9bf37e3_8
    - libcxx 11.0.1 habf9029_0
    - libedit 3.1.20191231 h0678c8f_2
    - libev 4.33 haf1e3a3_1
    - libllvm11 11.0.1 h223d4b2_0
    - libnghttp2 1.43.0 h07e645a_0
    - libssh2 1.9.0 h8a08a2b_5
    - libuv 1.40.0 h35c211d_0
    - llvm-tools 11.0.1 h223d4b2_0
    - lz4-c 1.9.3 h046ec9c_0
    - make 4.3 h22f3db7_1
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - openssl 1.1.1i h35c211d_0
    - rhash 1.4.1 h35c211d_0
    - tapi 1100.0.11 h9ce4665_0
    - tk 8.6.10 h0419947_1
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1010
    - zstd 1.4.8 hf387650_1
  host:
    - ca-certificates 2020.12.5 h033912b_0
    - libblas 3.9.0 8_openblas
    - libcblas 3.9.0 8_openblas
    - libcxx 11.0.1 habf9029_0
    - libffi 3.3 h046ec9c_2
    - libframel 8.41.1 hbcf498f_0
    - libgfortran 5.0.0 9_3_0_h6c81a4c_17
    - libgfortran5 9.3.0 h6c81a4c_17
    - liblapack 3.9.0 8_openblas
    - libopenblas 0.3.12 openmp_h54245bb_1
    - llvm-openmp 11.0.1 h7c73e74_0
    - ncurses 6.2 h2e338ed_4
    - numpy 1.16.6 py36h08dc641_0
    - openssl 1.1.1i h35c211d_0
    - python 3.6.12 h6c3b2c9_0_cpython
    - python_abi 3.6 1_cp36m
    - readline 8.0 h0678c8f_2
    - sqlite 3.34.0 h17101e1_0
    - tk 8.6.10 h0419947_1
    - xz 5.2.5 haf1e3a3_1
    - zlib 1.2.11 h7795811_1010
  run:
    - libframel 8.41.1 hbcf498f_0
    - numpy >=1.16.6,<2.0a0
    - python >=3.6,<3.7.0a0
    - python_abi 3.6.* *_cp36m
test:
  commands:
    - 'python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal;
      import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path(''data'') / ''test.gwf''),
      ''D1''); framel.frputvect(''test2.gwf'', [{''name'': ''A1:TEST'', ''data'':
      indata[0], ''start'': indata[1], ''dx'': indata[3], ''x_unit'': indata[4], ''y_unit'':
      indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d(''test2.gwf'', ''A1:TEST''); assert_array_equal(indata[0],
      indata2[0], ''read-write data mismatch''); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:],
      ''read-write metadata mismatch''; "

      '
  imports:
    - framel
  source_files:
    - data/test.gwf
about:
  description: 'A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave

    Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.

    The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation

    including file input/output.

    This package provides the python bindings.'
  home: http://lappweb.in2p3.fr/virgo/FrameL/
  license: LGPL-2.1-or-later
  license_family: LGPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: LIGO/Virgo Frame Library
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  feedstock-name: framel
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - anthchirp
    - duncanmmacleod

about.description:
A Common Data Frame Format for Interferometric Gravitational Wave
Detector has been developed by VIRGO and LIGO.
The Frame Library is a software dedicated to the frame manipulation
including file input/output.
This package provides the python bindings.

commands: python -c "from pathlib import Path; from numpy.testing import assert_array_equal; import framel; indata = framel.frgetvect1d(str(Path('data') / 'test.gwf'), 'D1'); framel.frputvect('test2.gwf', [{'name': 'A1:TEST', 'data': indata[0], 'start': indata[1], 'dx': indata[3], 'x_unit': indata[4], 'y_unit': indata[5]}]); indata2 = framel.frgetvect1d('test2.gwf', 'A1:TEST'); assert_array_equal(indata[0], indata2[0], 'read-write data mismatch'); assert indata[1:] == indata2[1:], 'read-write metadata mismatch'; "
